summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Department of Parks and Recreation to accept funds in the sum of Five Million ($5,000,000) Dollars from City Investors Inc, through the Seattle Parks Foundation, and authorizing the execution of an Agreement between the City of Seattle and City Investors Inc, regarding said funds, and appropriating the funds and providing the Department of Parks and Recreation with the appropriate expenditure authority to complete the initial phase of South Lake Union Park construction as agreed to in the terms of said Agreement.
note: South Lake Union Park Development project funding
